The 2022 Tech-a-thon is a fully-virtual event organized by the International Network on Appropriate Technology (INAT) that will provide an opportunity to design and build a project in accordance with the values of Appropriate Technology. Student teams will have several weeks to design a detailed solution or construct a prototype.

Tech-a-thon participants will be able to attend the tech fair, workshops, and paper sessions at the 9th International Conference on Appropriate Technology.

At the culmination of the techathon, projects will be evaluated and winning teams will receive monetary prizes of up to $1,200.
